import React, { useRef, useForm } from 'react' import { v4 as uuidV4 } from 'uuid' import './loginForm.scss' export default function Login({onFormSwitch, onEmailSubmit, onPasswordSubmit}) { const emailRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() onEmailSubmit(emailRef.current.value) onPasswordSubmit(passwordRef.current.value) } function router (){ onFormSwitch() } return (
